front.title: Citykiller
front.setup: Put Leviathan into play "Citykiller" side up. Search the villain deck for a Tactic card and put it into play
front.gameplay:
When flipped to this side, destroy H hero cards
At the end of the villain turn, Leviathan deals 2 melee damage to all hero targets.
At the end of the villain turn, if Leviathan has been dealt 8 - H damage in one instance last round, flip Leviathan
front.advanced: Reduce damage dealt to Leviathan by 1

back.title: Citykiller Retaliates
back.gameplay:
When flipped to this side, reveal cards from the top of the villain deck until you reveal a Tactic card. Put it into play; shuffle the rest of the revealed cards back into the villain deck.
At the start of the villain turn, flip Leviathan
Reduce damage dealt to Leviathan by 1
back.advanced: The first time Leviathan would flip each turn, play the top card of the villain deck first

card.name: Water Shadow
card.text: Whenever Leviathan would deal damage to a target, this card deals that target 2 irreducible melee damage. This card is indestructible

card.name: Torrential Downpour
card.text: At the start of each hero turn, Leviathan deals that hero 1 cold damage. This card is indestructible

card.name: Lose the War
card.text:
If the environment deck is ever empty, the heroes lose the game. At the end of the villain turn, remove the top card of the environment deck from the game.
Players may skip any of their phases (play, power, draw). Every time a player skips a phase, they may take a card from the environment trash and shuffle it back into the environment deck
This card is indestructible

card.name: Faster Than You'd Think
card.text: The first time Leviathan would be dealt damage each round, prevent that damage. This card is indestructible

card.name: Impossible Strength
card.text: Increase damage dealt by villain cards by 1

card.name: Impossible Toughness
card.text: Reduce damage dealt to Leviathan by 1

card.name: Impossible Endurance
card.text: At the start of the villain turn, reveal cards from the top of the villain trash until you reveal a one-shot. Play it, and then shuffle the other revealed cards back into the villain trash

card.name: Tidal Wave
card.text: Destroy all environment targets. Leviathan deals X cold damage to all non-villain targets, where X = 1 + the number of cards destroyed in this way

card.name: Cunning
card.text: Play the top 2 cards of the villain deck

card.name: Anyone Can Die
card.text: Leviathan deals the hero target with the highest HP 5 irreducible melee damage

card.name: Whipping Tail
card.text: Leviathan deals 2 melee damage to the 2 hero targets with the lowest HP
